fr.jju.controllers
Class LoginController

java.lang.Object
  fr.jju.controllers.LoginController

@Controller
public class LoginController
extends java.lang.Object

The LoginController class takes the requests done by login.jsp and transforms them into the login view and logic. It takes whatever additional parameters are in the URL from bad logins to successful logouts and renders a short message

Author:
Suiz

Method Detail

displayLogin

@RequestMapping(value="login")
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView displayLogin(@RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                java.lang.String loginfail,
                                                                                java.lang.String logout)
displayLogin takes it's request through the security bean. If it fails it redirects to the same login view with additional parameters in the URL to explain the failure

Parameters:
loginfail - URL parameter that allows the view to display and error message
logout - URL parameter that allows the view to display a successful logout message
Returns:
ModelAndView view of the login page along with a message if required.
